macrovalue.element: Before she can say another word, her head flies off in an arc, hewn roughly off her shoulders by the elven warrior's blade. Her body slumps backwards to the ground, never to move again.
The lizard woman's neck gushes with blood, throat slit by Vala's blade in an instant. She gurgles and twitches to the ground, dead within seconds.
A vicious gash runs down the defeated lizard's body, Vala cutting her down without pause.
Whirling around, Vala removes the saurian warriors head swiftly, with a well placed strike.
Stabbing in an exposed, unarmoured spot, Vala's blade pierces the saurian heart.
Vala picks up the defeated woman's mace, smashing it into her chest. She crumples as easily as her brigandine.
Using the lizard's own weapon, Vala caves in the head of her enemy with a two-handed bash.
